bookName: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
author: Stephen Covey
review: Covey presents timeless principles that can transform both personal and professional lives.

author: Carol Dweck
review: Dweck's groundbreaking research on mindset reveals how beliefs about our abilities shape our lives.

author: Robert Kiyosaki
review: Kiyosaki challenges conventional wisdom about money and offers valuable lessons for financial success.

bookName: The Hard Thing About Hard Things
author: Ben Horowitz
review: Horowitz shares candid insights and practical advice on navigating the challenges of building and leading a startup.
